name: Technology
description: From modern web applications to complex backend systems, I provide comprehensive technical solutions using cutting-edge technologies. Specializing in Next.js, React, and full-stack development, I build scalable, performant, and maintainable applications that drive business growth.

name: Design
description: Creating intuitive and engaging user experiences through thoughtful interface design and interaction patterns. I focus on accessibility, performance, and user-centered design principles to deliver interfaces that are both beautiful and functional.

name: Growth
description: Optimizing your digital presence for maximum impact through technical SEO, performance optimization, and analytics implementation. I help businesses scale their online operations with data-driven strategies and continuous improvement.
